attributes.action: Grant Better Benefits for People who suffer with M.E
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who suffer with M.E from a young age are not being given the financial help they need as they get older. The current benefit system is a shambles, being that in order to claim incapacity benefit you have to have paid a certain amount of tax. How can someone who has had the illness from a young age pay any tax when they have been unable to work. This matter needs to be bought to attention
